entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 after midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 80. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Local blowing snow early in the evening. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
